Object.Name: IPSO Digital Output
Object.Description1: This IPSO object is a generic object that can be used with any kind of digital output interface. Specific object for a given range of sensors is described later in the document, enabling to identify the type of sensors directly from its Object ID. This object may be used as a generic object if a dedicated one does not exist.

Item.Name: Digital Output State
Item.Description: The current state of a digital output.

Item.Name: Digital Output Polarity
Item.Description: The polarity of a digital ouput as a Boolean (0 = Normal, 1= Reversed).

Item.Name: Application Type
Item.Description: The application type of the output as a string, for instance, “LED”
